class NibbleKCM16:public PMtop

Interface

Public Members
const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)
void out(WireVector<Bool, NM_INPUT_WIDTH>&Out, // Output nibble <BR> WireVector<Bool, NM_MULT_WIDTH> *SOut=NULL) // res bits [16..32] <BR>
void place()
void place(int x,int y)

Description

Constant(K) Coefficient Multiplier (nibble serial)
technique: Distributed Arithmetic
16 bit x 16 bit -> 32 bit (16 bit serial + last 16 bit parallel)
AREA: width=3 height=12(4.5) => 12+12+4.5 = 28.5 CLBs

Member Description

const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)

word, 0 otherwise

void out(WireVector<Bool, NM_INPUT_WIDTH>&Out, // Output nibble <BR> WireVector<Bool, NM_MULT_WIDTH> *SOut=NULL) // res bits [16..32] <BR>

void place()

void place(int x,int y)

class NibbleKCM16b:public PMtop

Interface

const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)
void out(WireVector<Bool, NM_INPUT_WIDTH>&Out, // Output nibble WireVector<Bool, NM_MULT_WIDTH> *SOut=NULL) // res bits [16..32]
void place()
void place(int x,int y)

Description

Constant(K) Coefficient Multiplier (nibble serial)
technique: adder tree
16 bit x 16 bit -> 32 bit
AREA: width=3 height=16 => 48 CLBs

Member Description

const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)

word, 0 otherwise

void out(WireVector<Bool, NM_INPUT_WIDTH>&Out, // Output nibble WireVector<Bool, NM_MULT_WIDTH> *SOut=NULL) // res bits [16..32]

void place()

end nibble mult out

void place(int x,int y)

Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)
void out(WireVector<Bool, MM_INPUT_WIDTH>& Out)

Description

Modulo 2^16+1 (nibble serial)
e.g. for IDEA encryption

class SerKCM16:public PMtop

Interface

const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)
void out(Bool &Out, // Output bit <BR> WireVector<Bool, SM_WIDTH> *SOut=NULL) // res bits [16..32] <BR>

Description

Constant(K) Coefficient Multiplier : bit-serial
AREA: about 2 x N/2 = 16 CLBs

Member Description

const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)

word, 0 otherwise

void out(Bool &Out, // Output bit <BR> WireVector<Bool, SM_WIDTH> *SOut=NULL) // res bits [16..32] <BR>

void place()

end nibble mult out

class ParKCM16:public PMtop

Interface

ParKCM16(WireVector<Bool, PM_WIDTH>& Input, // nibble input <BR> const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)
void out(WireVector<Bool, 32>& Output)
void place()
void place(int x,int y)

Description

Constant(K) Coefficient Multiplier (16 bit fully parallel)
AREA: 4x20 ROMS, Adder Tree: 12+12+16 => 80 CLBs

Member Description

ParKCM16(WireVector<Bool, PM_WIDTH>& Input, // nibble input <BR> const int& mult, // constant factor <BR> Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)

void out(WireVector<Bool, 32>& Output)
